meanings.definition: To produce a sequel to a previously released work.
meanings.sent1: The director sequelized the popular movie, continuing the story.
meanings.sent2: The studio sequelized the successful film to satisfy the audience's demand for more.
meanings.sent3: The filmmaker sequelized the hit movie, creating a new chapter in the story.
meanings.sent4: She sequelized the book with a follow-up that delighted readers.
meanings.sent5: The author sequelized the novel, expanding the plot and characters.

meanings.definition: Having been made into a sequel.
meanings.sent1: The sequelized movie continued the adventures of the main characters.
meanings.sent2: The sequelized film was a hit at the box office, surpassing the original.
meanings.sent3: The sequelized story added new twists and turns to the original plot.
meanings.sent4: The sequelized book captured the essence of the first installment in a fresh way.
meanings.sent5: The sequelized series kept fans eagerly awaiting each new episode.
